evidence.claim: Cognitive Leap Solutions utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The company implements FHIR standards for health data integration.
They support HL7 transaction sets within their platform offerings.
Cognitive Leap Solutions uses Apache Kafka for data streaming solutions.
Integration patterns with dbt for data transformation are employed.

icp.icp_reason: No explicit use cases for X12 transactions or EDI found on the site.
